channel.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
channel.description: as my title sez, i want to know what you ppl think of ol mr. George "OILADDICT" Bush disscuss, fight, kill eachother, idc =-)

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @Nazgand1 Nazgand~
item.description:
@Nazgand1 wrote:

2. Blamed bin Laden for 9/11 (which is okay), but when he couldn't find him, made Americans forget about him by diverting their attention to Saddam Hussein, who had absolutely nothing to do with 9/11. Has he found bin Laden? Has he found any WMDs? Didn't think so.
A debate on this would be nice, probably get more than half the country an actual reason to hate him.All these music videos today keep saying hes a bad president but don't even give a reason why?

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @Blessed_Monkey Blessed Monkey
item.description:
@Blessed_Monkey wrote:

Bush is definitely not the BEST president ever. Now before you go crazy on me, I definitely do not think he is president-material. I like to think of him as an average guy. Few people you see on the street are capable of being president, and Bush represents that. He is no great tactician, and he doesn’t think before he acts, but I doubt any of you could be the single most powerful man in the strongest country in the world without a few screw-ups.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Ron:

You’re set in your ways. And no amoutn of facts or evidence will possibly persuade you to think that bush is an idiot. You think he’s patriotic because of his upbringing. Wow… that did not make sense at all. Do you know what patriotic means?

Wow… It’s like we’re speaking a completely different language. Or perhaps you just don’t read nor take the time to make a decent concise response.
You asked why he was patriotic. Perhaps the correct question word you were searching for was “how”. Take the time to go back and read maybe…

Ron:

You don’t even care that 3000 people died for no reason? How insensitive are you? It might have been a low death ratio, but look at how many iraqis have been killed. Over 100,000. And they were just pissed off cause there people were being killed because the US took down Saddam. The Shiites and Soonis are having a huge war because of us. Is that what we call spreading democracy? How about spreading chaos and anarchy? That fits the goal.

-I never said I didn’t care, nor implied it.
-This war has saved lives: http://www.weeklystandard.com/Utilities/printer_preview.asp?idArticle=3889&R
Although numbers have changed since the article, it still remains true, barely. But this is comparing killings from a war with cause against systematic genocide. Not an even comparison…
-And I’m not sure it’s fair to say they’re going to war because of the US…

Ron:

People are calling this Bush’s Vietnam, and he doesn’t want to lose.

People says lots of moronic things. That’s only one of them,

Ron:

He finally admitted the whole war was wrong yesterday and people said it’s about fuckin time he realized.

Nope. Source?

Ron:

Even though the shit is hitting the fan, you are still saying the world is still right.

Nope. I’ve quite simply just been saying that Bush isn’t the worst president ever.
And unless you can, from memory, list all US president and give a brief history of them, you’re not fit to make such a decision.
I, to an extent, can do such. (had to do a big project on presidents once that scarred me for life)

Ron:

You’re glad we went to the iraq war.

Yup. But I’m not glad about the way we fought it. It was a politically correct war of which no one can win.

Ron:

You’re glad 3000 people died because of bush.

They didn’t die because of Bush.

Ron:

You’re glad saddam is dead and 100,000 iraqis have been killed.

It’s more than 100,000… lol
But yes, I’m glad. Glad it wasn’t more.

Ron:

You’re glad the deficit is 8 trillion dollars and the only factor was bush and his iraq war which has been accumulating to over trillions of dollars.

The only factor? Wow… you are indeed an expert on the economy. :rolleyes:
The deficit was obviously going to go up, I see no way anyone could’ve avoided that. But I certainly don’t like the excessive spending (since I’m a conservative, if you didn’t know :)). And even though Bush tries to make himself seem conservative, he isn’t. Conservatives don’t spend as much as he does.

Ron:

You’re glad you have no clue what the unemploymency is in the US because you never even heard of the millions of jobs lost due to outsourcing in this country.

I’m not aware?
Please point that out on this graph please:
http://data.bls.gov/PDQ/graphics/lns14000000_106437_1168626478746.gif
Oh wait… Bush is manipulating those numbers, I forgot. :rolleyes:

Ron:

You’re glad that bush says global warming doesn’t exist and pays off his researchers to say that it doesn’t… when it does (it’s summer in NH right now when it should be freezing cold).

We’re near record lows here in Sacramento, cA. Some even say it may snow (which rarely happens here, FYI):
http://www.sacbee.com/101/story/103936.html

Ron:

He shouldn’t just be impeached, he should be tried for treason for an illegal war that was not allowed by congress

Illegal war without approval of Congress? WTF.
Is that what you call the ~70% of the House and the 77% of the Senate that voted yes on the Iraq war resolution?

Ron:

Edit: oh and cruel, illegal tapping is illegal. We are supposed to have constitutional rights, but bush treats the constitution like toilet paper. No law is supposed to violate any of the constitional or bill of rights.

Yes, illegal tapping is illegal. But he never did illegal tapping that I’m aware of. He did the legal type… :rolleyes: lol

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

You’re set in your ways. And no amoutn of facts or evidence will possibly persuade you to think that bush is an idiot. You think he’s patriotic because of his upbringing. Wow… that did not make sense at all. Do you know what patriotic means?

Dictionary.com’s meaning of a patriot.

a person who loves, supports, and defends his or her country and its interests with devotion.

He did not love, he did not support, and he did not defend. His interests were for himself and the republican party. He has made so much money in the war and a lot of people don’t even see this. You don’t even care that 3000 people died for no reason? How insensitive are you? It might have been a low death ratio, but look at how many iraqis have been killed. Over 100,000. And they were just pissed off cause there people were being killed because the US took down Saddam. The Shiites and Soonis are having a huge war because of us. Is that what we call spreading democracy? How about spreading chaos and anarchy? That fits the goal.

They don’t care that we brought saddam down. They just want us to leave. So before we have anymore americans and iraqis killed, let’s leave. People are calling this Bush’s Vietnam, and he doesn’t want to lose. He finally admitted the whole war was wrong yesterday and people said it’s about fuckin time he realized.

Just to sum up…
And you’re not just oblivious, you’re stubborn. Even though the shit is hitting the fan, you are still saying the world is still right. You’re glad we went to the iraq war. You’re glad 3000 people died because of bush. You’re glad saddam is dead and 100,000 iraqis have been killed. You’re glad the deficit is 8 trillion dollars and the only factor was bush and his iraq war which has been accumulating to over trillions of dollars. You’re glad you have no clue what the unemploymency is in the US because you never even heard of the millions of jobs lost due to outsourcing in this country. You’re glad that bush says global warming doesn’t exist and pays off his researchers to say that it doesn’t… when it does (it’s summer in NH right now when it should be freezing cold).

leader:

Bush sucks, he should have been impeached a long time ago.

California was the first state to request it, others joined, but you need lots of states to say that. He shouldn’t just be impeached, he should be tried for treason for an illegal war that was not allowed by congress

Edit: oh and cruel, illegal tapping is illegal. We are supposed to have constitutional rights, but bush treats the constitution like toilet paper. No law is supposed to violate any of the constitional or bill of rights.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Silver Lining:

cruel, a “crappy” 200k-a-year salary? Let’s see… that’s more than most will ever aspire to earn. Also, he is paid for the rest of his life for his 8 years of service (or lack thereof) to our country.

Come on… don’t be a fool. Many president were skilled/popular enough to get the same, if not higher, salary doing an easier job.
There are many bad reasons be become president (fame, power, etc), but money is typically not one.

Silver Lining:

Hey, if I get paid large amounts of money to fuck up my country, I’ll take that job!

There’s are difference summed up right there. You have no morals.

Silver Lining:

Oh, and I wouldn’t mind getting away with illegal tapping or pretty much anything, for that matter.

Referring to the patriot act? That very act made it legal…
Now if Bush could make that act unilaterally, that’d be wrong. But as you should know, majority chose it.

Silver Lining:

Hopefully, with the new Democratic domination of Congress, we’ll be able to postpone any decisions by him and get a few good laws passed.

They better hurry then, it’ll only last two years.

[quote=“leader, post:31, topic:45082”]Bush sucks, he should have been impeached a long time ago.[/quote]Yes, he definitely should have!

psst Why exactly?

Ron:

lol cruel you think Bush is patriotic? Please tell me why he is patriotic?

I don’t know why… maybe because he had a good upbringing?

Ron:

Millions of americans in middle class and under have lost their jobs.

Unemployment skyrocketed in 2001, but has been steadily returning and is almost where is was before.
Saying the drop in 2001 was Bush’s fault? Please be joking…

Ron:

3000 Americans have now died in the war.

3000 deaths over almost a 5 year period!? That’s unheard of!
Oh wait… that’s the best wartime ratio ever…

Ron:

Bush is making enemies right and left, threatening so many people.

You’re right. It’d make him much more patriotic to base his decisions around the opinions of others.

Ron:

The defecit is at an all time high.

Too vague… there are so many factors here.

[quote=“Ron, post:28, topic:45082”]Bush is making money off the war, and doesn’t give a fuck. He just asked for several billions dollars in funding and 10,000 more americans to wipe out in the shit iraq war.[/quote]Opinion, not fact.

Ron:

You must be very oblivious to all of this, if you think this is patriotic?

No, actually. But I’m obviously oblivious to your valid points showing how Bush is unpatriotic.

Ron:

Clinton did some amazing things. But anything is better than our idiot president.

He balance the budget during a booming economy.
Brilliant…

Ron:

Hugo Chavez called him Satin lol.

Speaking of idiots with low IQs…

Ron:

Replace all the “Clinton” with Bush and that will be correct.

Did you even read what i said. Both Bush and Clinton share the mentions items. But people generally have completely different views on the same actions during the different administrations.

[quote=“Ron, post:28, topic:45082”]There were no WMDs.[/quote]How do you know? Iraq had 'em before.

Ron:

There was no solid evidence to connect Saddam with Al Quaeda, so that statement is just fuckin false.

More of a strike against Clinton than Bush, bud. His administration was the one that claimed such.

Ron:

If you believe all that bullshit, even now, when all the news has come out, that you haven’t been reading, then you’re definitely oblivious. I’m not insulting you, just saying you need to read this information. The only people ingnorant now, are lol, the people that don’t know. Still about 20% or so.

You’re oblivious to what I’m tyring say because you don’t read.
Or perhaps just misreading what I’m saying…

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

From what I’ve seen, Bush is a egocentric person that has been able to do almost anything because of the Republican majority in Congress. cruel, a “crappy” 200k-a-year salary? Let’s see… that’s more than most will ever aspire to earn. Also, he is paid for the rest of his life for his 8 years of service (or lack thereof) to our country. Hey, if I get paid large amounts of money to fuck up my country, I’ll take that job! Oh, and I wouldn’t mind getting away with illegal tapping or pretty much anything, for that matter. And hey, I have to join the military, yet I don’t have to show up for duty? How wonderful. But why stop with the US? Let’s fuck up Iraq, then possibly Iran and North Korea! Hopefully, with the new Democratic domination of Congress, we’ll be able to postpone any decisions by him and get a few good laws passed.[quote=“leader, post:31, topic:45082”]Bush sucks, he should have been impeached a long time ago.[/quote]A sound idea, yet it seems such won’t happen.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:15, topic:45082”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=62625.msg752586#msg752586 date=1168325680]
I just don’t understand the whole oil conspiracy. Why would bush pay many many billions of dollars for oil, and lose many soldiers, when he could probably guy it for cheaper?
[/quote]

The war uses up alot of oil, and all of Bush’s friends are in the military/civilian contracting fields etc… Think about it it will become clear ;).[/quote]
I have been saying that for so long! I said it in about 3 other topics, and no one ever fuckin believed me. The whole republican party is in cahoots with bush. They all made so much money off the war. Glad you saw that too. Finally some intelligent people.

lol cruel you think Bush is patriotic? Please tell me why he is patriotic? Millions of americans in middle class and under have lost their jobs. 3000 Americans have now died in the war. Bush is making enemies right and left, threatening so many people. The defecit is at an all time high. Bush is making money off the war, and doesn’t give a fuck. He just asked for several billions dollars in funding and 10,000 more americans to wipe out in the shit iraq war.

You must be very oblivious to all of this, if you think this is patriotic? Maybe I should go and shoot someone, that would make me so patriotic. Especially if I made money on it! Oh yaaaa! :rolleyes:

Itachi Uchiha:

Bad at politics, but good at war/causing hell.

Any jerk off can destroy, but it takes intelligence to build. Why does everyone want war? Why more deaths? Are you people really that sadistic?

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:22, topic:45082”][quote author=Ron link=topic=62625.msg751440#msg751440 date=1168306795]
Clinton was a wicked smart guy, he had like a 200 or 190 ish IQ whereas Bush (which is proven) has a double digit IQ or one around 110. Which is pretty much a bird brain.
[/quote]
You’re comparing your future children’s intelligence to that of a birds?[/quote]
Einstein to the village idiot.

[quote=“Krazy_Meerkat, post:24, topic:45082”]I think clinton has done a shitload more for your country than bush ever could. I trust clinton but I cannot trust bush. After seeing his reaction when told about the 9/11 attacks I had no respect for george w. bush at all. The worst part was when he stayed in the classroom and continued reading with the class, knowing that his country could potentially be under attack.
I think he is a bad man who will be replaced by more bad people. He should not be in charge of a country.
I’m not here to argue anything really so don’t flame at me, my opinions will most likely remain the same no matter what is said.[/quote]
Smart guy right there. Yeah I totally agree man. Clinton did some amazing things. But anything is better than our idiot president. Hugo Chavez called him Satin lol.

[quote=“cruel, post:21, topic:45082”]-Clinton made a unilateral decision (yes, against the UN) to bomb Iraq because of weapons programs
-Clinton’s administration acknowledged the existence of WMDs in Iraq and felt Iraq to be a threat
-Clinton’s administration solid evidence of a link between Saddam’s regime and Al Qaeda[/quote]
Replace all the “Clinton” with Bush and that will be correct. There were no WMDs. There was no connection to Al Qaeda. Bush said intelligence failed when asked “what about the WMDs?” which was complete bullshit cause a week later, CIA said that notified bush of there being no WMDs but bush insisted on going to war. There was no solid evidence to connect Saddam with Al Quaeda, so that statement is just fuckin false.

If you believe all that bullshit, even now, when all the news has come out, that you haven’t been reading, then you’re definitely oblivious. I’m not insulting you, just saying you need to read this information. The only people ingnorant now, are lol, the people that don’t know. Still about 20% or so.

bullzeye:

Just for the record, I agree with everything cruel said.

woopteedoo, we all know you are a conservative sheep following mom/dad.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.description:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:22, topic:45082”][quote author=Ron link=topic=62625.msg751440#msg751440 date=1168306795]
Clinton was a wicked smart guy, he had like a 200 or 190 ish IQ whereas Bush (which is proven) has a double digit IQ or one around 110. Which is pretty much a bird brain.
[/quote]
You’re comparing your future children’s intelligence to that of a birds?[/quote]Thanks Kane, new sig!

Just for the record, I agree with everything cruel said.

item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @Krazy_Meerkat Krazy_Meerkat
item.description:
@Krazy_Meerkat wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:22, topic:45082”][quote author=Ron link=topic=62625.msg751440#msg751440 date=1168306795]
Clinton was a wicked smart guy, he had like a 200 or 190 ish IQ whereas Bush (which is proven) has a double digit IQ or one around 110. Which is pretty much a bird brain.
[/quote]
You’re comparing your future children’s intelligence to that of a birds?[/quote]
So bush has the IQ of a child? Well you don’t need to double-check that one -.-

I do not approve of bush. I think his morals and attitude to leading a country is entirely wrong. Let me get started…
He starts a war on “terror”, an omni-namable enemy that can never die
He imposes a “with us or against us” to war, I thought war was a bad thing?
He lets soldiers of many nationalities die for his own beliefs.
He seems to be widening the rich v poor gap by supporting the corporations and not the workers.
His public speaking skills are incredibly lacking, sometimes I begin to wonder if he knows what he is saying.
He is carrying on his father’s work.
He invades a country full of people who hate america and tries to change their way of life and set up his own political system.
He takes rights away from civilians (I’m referring to the anti-terror laws which (if I’m correct) hypothetically violate many of the laws already in place (reguarding searching and captivity))

I think clinton has done a shitload more for your country than bush ever could. I trust clinton but I cannot trust bush. After seeing his reaction when told about the 9/11 attacks I had no respect for george w. bush at all. The worst part was when he stayed in the classroom and continued reading with the class, knowing that his country could potentially be under attack.
I think he is a bad man who will be replaced by more bad people. He should not be in charge of a country.
I’m not here to argue anything really so don’t flame at me, my opinions will most likely remain the same no matter what is said.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @apzrman apzrman
item.description:
@apzrman wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:6, topic:45082”]Yeah, Bush, unlike our very own John Howard, can not stay in politics for ever! I think the funniest thing related to that was a skit on comedy inc with John Howard talking about sweet talking all of the next possible US presidents.

Of course there’s another question - Would any of the other possible presidents do any better? Here in Australia we have two dominant political parties. The first is the Liberal Party (led by John Howard), and the second is the Labor Party (Yes, it’s spelt like that. I can’t remember who their leader is now, but it was Kim Beazley). The issue here is that no matter which one we vote for, we’ll still have an annoying group of people governing Australia. So it’s a lose lose situation, and people don’t care enough… So they just vote Johnny everytime, because he hasn’t fucked us up yet.
Is it the same situation in America? Because then you couldn’t really put him down…[/quote]
the better skit was when john said he’s quitting

"Fellow Australians, I have decided to retire from being prime minister and politics altogether... Stop celebrating!
only reason y people keep howard is koz he makes out that the opositions put taxes up and charge more 4 food.... and he keeps promising 2 pull the troops outa iraq

Read full topic

item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Ron:

Clinton was a wicked smart guy, he had like a 200 or 190 ish IQ whereas Bush (which is proven) has a double digit IQ or one around 110. Which is pretty much a bird brain.

You’re comparing your future children’s intelligence to that of a birds?

item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?

item.title: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Ron:

You don’t think Bush is dumb? He can’t even say complete sentences. I can’t believe there is still such a high percentage that likes that asinine, unpatriotic, dumb as dirt, belligerent, fuck head.

I never said I thought he wasn’t dumb. Don’t make up shit.
And don’t you even dare call him unpatriotic. I can’t think of one president that was such. It takes a very patriotic person to be president. They certainly aren’t doing it for the crappy $200k a yr. salary…

Ron:

lol, ya right. Clinton made the economy so much better. We also started paying off the huge defecit we had back then. Then Bush came and added 4 trillion dollars to the defecit.

Oh, I apologize.
He balanced the budget… that makes up for everything… -_-

Ron:

If I asked you why you didn’t like Clinton, my best guess would be, that you would go all Southern US on me and say “he slept with monica loinskee!” or “he lied!”

No, those two reasons just made him unfit to be president (assuming the “lie” was referring to the perjury in court). It didn’t make him a bad president. But even if so, those’d be better than your reason of “Bush is dumb”.
But if you were referring the to the lie he told the survivors of Rwanda’s genocide, then yes, that’s one of the many reasons I’d give. He avoided the genocide and, in essence, lets hundreds of thousands of people die. You certainly can’t say the same about Bush. At least he responded to the Kurdish genocide… and not a belated response, like Clinton’s.
In fact, you could even say that Clinton was partially, if not fully, responsible for the WTC attacks since Clinton let Osama Bin Laden slip away even after Sudan offered him up to him. Although that’s a little bit unfair, it’s very true.

-Clinton made a unilateral decision (yes, against the UN) to bomb Iraq because of weapons programs
-Clinton’s administration acknowledged the existence of WMDs in Iraq and felt Iraq to be a threat
-Clinton’s administration solid evidence of a link between Saddam’s regime and Al Qaeda

Would the supporters of the administration support Bush’s doing of the same thing? Of course not (because he has, and they don’t)… the hatred against Bush is practically fully personal and unreasonable.

Ron:

Bush is such a fucking retard, that anyone who doesn’t think he was the worst president should be shot on site. Clinton is soooo the complete antithesis of George Bush. Clinton was a wicked smart guy, he had like a 200 or 190 ish IQ whereas Bush (which is proven) has a double digit IQ or one around 110. Which is pretty much a bird brain.

^All ignorant dabble. I’d suggest extend real points.

Read full topic
item.source: Is Bush An Idiot that deserves to be put down as the "Worst President...EVER"?
